amendment.description: To provide for the extension of the special net operating loss carryover provision.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2882 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2882 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bunning to Amendment SA 2687. (consideration: CR S2851-2852; text: CR S2851-2852) To provide for the extension of the special net operating loss carryover provision.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2882 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2882 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bunning to Amendment SA 2687.
